languages.text: {n}Ваше сознание выплывает из океана мрака и кошмаров — словно кто-то властной рукой вытащил вас из его глубин. В темном помещении двигаются длинные заостренные тени, перекидывающиеся отрывистыми фразами. Одна из теней приближается к вам, разрывая полог боли и приобретая знакомые черты.{/n}

{n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше сознание выплывает из океана мрака и кошмаров — словно кто-то властной рукой вытащил вас из его глубин. В темном помещении двигаются длинные заостренные тени, перекидывающиеся отрывистыми фразами. Одна из теней приближается к вам, разрывая полог боли и приобретая знакомые черты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, lanky and angular shadows move and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches, tearing the veil of pain and acquiring features that look familiar.{/n}

{n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, lanky and angular shadows move and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches, tearing the veil of pain and acquiring features that look familiar.{/n}

In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

{n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre conscience émerge d'un océan de ténèbres et de cauchemars, comme si une main puissante vous avait {mf|attrapé|attrapée} dans ses profondeurs et {mf|ramené|ramenée} à la surface. Dans la salle obscure, des ombres longilignes et anguleuses se déplacent et échangent des remarques. L'une d'entre elles s'approche de vous et, déchirant le voile de douleur, révèle des traits qui vous semblent familiers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre conscience émerge d'un océan de ténèbres et de cauchemars, comme si une main puissante vous avez {mf|attrapé|attrapée} dans ses profondeurs et {mf|ramené|ramenée} à la surface. Dans la salle obscure, des ombres filiformes et anguleuses se déplacent et échangent des remarques. L'une des ombres s'approche de vous et, déchirant le voile de douleur, révèle des traits qui vous semblent familiers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的意识从黑暗与噩梦的海洋中浮现出来，仿佛有人向你伸出了强而有力的手臂，将你拉入了光明之中。在黑暗的房间里，无数身材修长、棱角分明的影子四处走动，交换着意见。一个阴影朝你走来，撕开痛苦的面纱，露出了你熟悉的容貌。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的意识从黑暗与噩梦的海洋中浮现出来，仿佛有人向你伸出了强而有力的手臂，将你拉入了光明之中。在黑暗的房间里，无数身材修长、棱角分明的影子四处走动，交换着意见。一个阴影朝你走来，撕开痛苦的面纱，露出了你熟悉的容貌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}まるで誰かの力強い手が深淵に伸び、あなたを光の中へ引っ張り上げたかのように、あなたの意識が暗闇と悪夢の海から浮かび上がってきた。暗い部屋の中で、長く角ばった影がいくつも動き回り、言葉を交わしている。影のひとつがあなたに近づき、その苦痛のヴェールを破ると、見覚えのある特徴が現れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}まるで誰かの力強い手が深淵に伸び、あなたを光の中へ引っ張り上げたかのように、あなたの意識が暗闇と悪夢の海から浮かび上がってきた。暗い部屋の中で、長く角ばった影がいくつも動き回り、言葉を交わしている。影のひとつがあなたに近づき、その苦痛のヴェールを破ると、見覚えのある特徴が現れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Bewusstsein erwacht aus einem Meer der Dunkelheit und der Alpträume, als ob jemand mit starker Hand in die Tiefe gegriffen und dich zum Licht geführt hätte. Im dunklen Raum bewegen sich lange und kantige Schatten und wechseln Worte. Einer der Schatten tritt an dich heran, zerreißt den Schleier des Schmerzes und offenbart dir mittlerweile vertraute Gesichtszüge.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein Bewusstsein erwacht aus einem Meer der Dunkelheit und der Alpträume, als ob jemand mit starker Hand in die Tiefe gegriffen und dich zum Licht geführt hätte. Im dunklen Raum bewegen sich hagere und kantige Schatten und wechseln Worte. Einer der Schatten tritt an dich heran, zerreißt den Schleier des Schmerzes und offenbart dir mittlerweile vertraute Gesichtszüge.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu consciencia emerge de un océano de oscuridad y pesadillas como si una poderosa mano se hubiera sumergido hasta lo más hondo y te sacara a la luz. Varias sombras largas y angulosas se desplazan por la penumbra de la sala intercambiando comentarios. Una de ellas se aproxima a ti, desgarrando el velo de dolor que te cubre los ojos y revelándote unas facciones que te resultan familiares.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu consciencia emerge de un océano de oscuridad y pesadillas como si una poderosa mano se hubiera sumergido hasta lo más hondo y te sacara a la luz. Varias sombras escuálidas y angulosas se desplazan por la penumbra de la sala intercambiando comentarios. Una de ellas se aproxima a ti, penetrando el velo del dolor que te cubre los ojos y revelándote unas facciones que te resultan familiares.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bilincin, karanlıktan ve kâbuslardan oluşan bir okyanustan su yüzüne çıkıyor. Sanki güçlü bir el, o okyanusun derinliklerine elini sokup seni ışığa çekmiş gibi. Karanlık odada uzun ve açılı gölgeler hareket edip bir şeyler konuşuyor. Gölgelerin biri sana yaklaşıyor, acı örtüsünü yırtıyor ve tanıdığın bir yüzü ortaya çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your consciousness emerges from an ocean of darkness and nightmares, as if someone's powerful hand reached into its depths and brought you into the light. In the dark room, long and angular shadows move around and exchange remarks. One of the shadows approaches you, ripping apart the veil of pain and revealing features that look familiar to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bilincin, karanlıktan ve kâbuslardan oluşan bir okyanustan su yüzüne çıkıyor. Sanki güçlü bir el, o okyanusun derinliklerine elini sokmuş ve seni ışığa çekmiş gibi. Karanlık odada uzun ve açılı gölgeler hareket ederek bir şeyler konuşuyor. Gölgelerin biri sana yaklaşıyor, acı örtüsünü yırtıyor ve ortaya, tanıdığın bir yüz çıkıyor.{/n}
